wait am I playing?

Should we get started with our persist?

Also where is this battle located?

I'm not at home right now, but I'll be able to start shortly. I do have questions though.

What are the "random scenarios"?

No mods? Totally legit launches and movement?

How are pieces moved exactly? Do we spawn them on our turn like Starcraft, or do we start with them like Battleship?

What constitutes a ship class? Parts? Weight? Armament?

Is it okay to attack support ships? Do support ships count towards the fleet limit?

What types of movement are allowed? Prohibited?

I'm sure I can think of more. xD
because if I am I would like to go after zekes (on his team )
so im gonna make my own persist, then you can put in? can i put my ships in now? (I want to be aprty two)

I'm not at home right now, but I'll be able to start shortly. I do have questions though.

What are the "random scenarios"?

No mods? Totally legit launches and movement?

How are pieces moved exactly? Do we spawn them on our turn like Starcraft, or do we start with them like Battleship?

What constitutes a ship class? Parts? Weight? Armament?

Is it okay to attack support ships? Do support ships count towards the fleet limit?

What types of movement are allowed? Prohibited?

I'm sure I can think of more. xD

-random scenarios will follow what happens after this and the correct course of action

-no mods but you can cheat things in IF they are legitimatley capable

-as said they are your ships and all are there to start

-The cruiser has to be smaller than the vanguard,

-as said not until you eliminate all zokesian ships

-as said anything but ramming

@zekes:ok but the goal is the same and use the persist available

@treesniper next time

ok i have an old persist with a small force so ill just mod that in (they can all legit get to duna).
as long as they can do it only 2 fighters and a small cruiser.The persistence will carry on.The next scenario will be a one on one engagment over kerbin.
ok. I think i can take this one alone.

I am Le leader of the Kerbin Space Travel Agency (KSTA) A mostly peaceful space administration, that will declare war and demolish any agency that defies it or is hostile against it, they easily make allies and have multiple stations over kerbin, the mun , minmus, and a few over duna. they will help allies in need as it does not defy Rule # 7 in the KSTA defensive handbook "The KSTA will Help any allies in need as long as it does not breach the security of a planets fleet or involve putting inexpirenced pilots in battle before they are verified as pilots

Traits, Kerbal protective (Usally uses un manned probes for battles to make sure kerbals are not in danger) , Good Allies , Bad enemies and most of their stations and fleets have a defensive craft able to reach the object within have a kerbal day (3 in game hours)

Ok My fleet is in position.
